Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Swarmsense]{Swarmsense}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Swarm Form]{Swarm Form}

You exert control over masses of creatures.
name: Swarm Domain
